website_summaries.verdict: 100% Brazilian human hair directly donated by young women. Includes no chemical treatments.
pros: Can be easily straightened, curled, dyed, bleached, and styled
Double-wefted, no shedding, No fibers or animal hair mixed in
Comes with fake eye lashes and headband for when you wash your face
Great in all types of weather
cons: May get frizzy after a few weeks worth of wear
May be coarse for some, and hard to bleach

customer_reviews.title: 🔥
customer_reviews.text: The hair was absolutely gorgeous. It didn’t tangle or shed, and the closure was bomb as well. It holds curls + straightens so beautifully I didn’t even need to bleach the knots on it.m, or pluck it much. I’ve ordered from a lot of vendors on her. They’ve been the best so far. Longest I wore the hair was about maybe 4 months and then I decided to go and make a quick weave out of it. I’m ready to reorder more ❤️ This time I plan on just installing 4 bundles with my natural leave out
customer_reviews.author: Paige Jones

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I have had it in for a few weeks, so far so good. Only a little tangiling but nothing major
customer_reviews.author: Shade’

customer_reviews.title: Softness and shedding curl hold.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my hair Wednesday received it Friday. First time ordering from this vendor I LOVE, LOVE this hair. Even hairdress was shocked at how soft it was. I colored it black cold washed it and let it air dry. Very soft. I combed it several times NO SHEDDING true to length. Holds curls beautifully. I will definitely order this hair again. Believe me I did my research and tried a lot and spend a lot on hair. For the price I was very nervous. Well beyond my expectation. GREAT HAIR.
customer_reviews.author: Moobetta

customer_reviews.title: And I am so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase! And I am so happy I did! My stylist loves this hair as well! Thank you for delivering a reasonable priced and quality item. Will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Best hair ever
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this hair it is super soft and it can be washed and conditioned no issues with tangling I wore this hair for two separate weddings which were a week apart it had plenty of spritz and oil sheen put in it and it still was perfect after
customer_reviews.author: ainisha

customer_reviews.title: Hair is bomb.com
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair. First of all I have a big ass head and I need full hair to cover my head size lol. This hair is so full and I have not done anything to it yet I just got it installed . Once i curl the hair I’m sure it will look even better . I will be a customer forever !! 🙌🏽🙌🏽❤️❤️❤️ I used 4 bundles and the closure it came it.20 22,18,16 with a 16 inch closure .
customer_reviews.author: tejumola dahunsi

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival hair was very soft, beautiful curl pattern, and no smell. I'm rating it 4 stars right now because the hair has a few red-like highlights in it. The hair Color itself I would say is about a 1b. Once I've installed the hair I will do an update. I ordered 16,18,20 16 closure Update: so far I love the hair. Minimal shedding. It holds a nice curl too!
customer_reviews.author: Kenyatta Harrison

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is amazing. I will be be continuing to buy from this company it's so soft. If you know how to deal with weave then this is 100% the right company to go to.
customer_reviews.author: Adelaide Michel

customer_reviews.title: Not a body wave, just straight hair: false advertising
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the body wave, pre-washed it to get the smell out and it turned to straight hair. Not what ordered. Good straight hair but at the time, I wanted a wave.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic hair not human hair. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Whatever this is, it’s not human hair. It’s 100% synthetic hair. And I am a stylist, so trust me, I know! Please stop misleading people and overcharging them for synthetic hair. I get it’s cheap but it’s cheap for a reason. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Q M

customer_reviews.title: Worst hair ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst hair ever!!! I truly want my money back. This hair has broken me out all over!!! Hair feels like straws.
customer_reviews.author: Sheron Jones

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair I ordered it on august 29th and received it today august 31st. The hair is super soft. It has a smell but after I washed the bundles it was okay and don't even get me stated on the closure😍😩!!️ It was BOOOOMB and it matched the bundles will be buying from this vendor again❤️
customer_reviews.author: Daejonae Holley

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied once again... this hair is everything and i will continue purchasing ❤️❤️❤️... Holds curl,minimum shedding, soft, no smell, i just love it
customer_reviews.author: tinaesha

customer_reviews.title: Worse smelling hair ever!
customer_reviews.text: This hair smelled so bad. I washed it. I just couldnt get over how bad it smelled. I ened up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This hair sheds alot!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was okay. The hair had no smell. Initially the hair had a nice soft texture. I had the hair installed and curled on a Friday, and less than 8 hours, the curls fell from hair. The hair never returned to it natural state after washing and conditioning it. I only kept the hair in my head for two and a half weeks. During that time frame, the hair shredded tremendously. I feel as though this hair is only good for a weekend affair if that.
customer_reviews.author: q

customer_reviews.title: bad hair
customer_reviews.text: purchase this hair for the holiday and so excited about it has it feel so soft and nice..... however didn't get the chance to install it at that time when i finally do i was so disappointed.....this hair sheds like crazy, by the time i finish installing the hair it have no curl left and I DIDN'T COMB THE HAIR.....it really dry and fuzzy i could wear my hair down i have to keep catching it up in the back....NOT A GOOD HAIR WONT ORDER AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: trica

customer_reviews.title: Take that chance on this hair girl!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I absolutely love this hair! I was so afraid after reading some of the reviews that I almost didn't purchase but I took a chance! It arrived on time and out of the pack it was very soft, fresh, and bouncy. The lengths are true to order, and my hair arrived with two free gifts! A set of flexi rods as well as a pair of eyelashes. I've had it installed for almost a week now, and there's been very very little shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hair and for about a week it was okay. Then it started tangling and shedding horribly. I wrote a complaint on here. Chris who works for the company reached out to me and he asked me what was wrong with the hair and i send him pictures. He has fixed the issues that i had and that was great customer service. I fully understand that sometimes there are “bad” batches of hair so hopefully this next batch is better.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy brown

customer_reviews.title: Very bad hair
customer_reviews.text: I order this hair just put it in and even before i put it in, it start shedding alot. The hairdresser even said it's the worst hair she ever saw in.This hair is no good for my money I would not refer to nobody I cant even put a brush in it I put it for my birthday and ofto take it out same time. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Curls nicely but.....
customer_reviews.text: The closure curls amazingly! But the lace is the hideous gray color that blends with no ones complexion and there are a lot of short hairs throughout. I made it work but not best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Mcnair

customer_reviews.title: Never Buy This Hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair sheds allot. I am soo disappointed!! I will never purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They product is a scam!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product. It say that you can wash it, color it; they lied. If you wet the hair it turns thick and fluffy and if you color the hair it will begin to feel synthetic. Worst product ever. They lie!
customer_reviews.author: Virgo Hill

customer_reviews.title: A turn for the worst.....
customer_reviews.text: I was initially satisfied with this hair. This changed after the first wash. I followed "Hair Care" instructions provided to the letter. I purchased (I have receipts) the recommended GLISS Hair Repair conditioner & shampoo. After washing, I have significant stiffness & clumping of the hair at the back of my head. It can't be combed or brushed out. I will have to have the hair removed. I'm very disappointed that after what I though was a good purchase simply didn't last for even 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad....
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, Great customer service vendor goes above and beyond
customer_reviews.author: 718Girl

customer_reviews.title: save your money and get better quality. Bad hair!
customer_reviews.text: Ummmmm that’s a NO for this hair!!!!!!!! Got this hair yesterday. The hair smelled bad. Not fresh at all! So I co washed it. The hair was a hot mess after I washed it. I had to go through and try and comb out the knots and the hair was coming out. The hair had plastic strands in it red and blue yarn stands and some weird looking stuff in it that looked questionable. This is NOT good hair and I am very familiar with hair. Threw it out!
customer_reviews.author: Glam By Deya

customer_reviews.title: THIN and NOT TRUE TO LENGTH
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I ordered the 14, 16, and 18 inch bundles and they’re SO thin and NOT the correct length at all. It’s more like 10, 12, 14 inches...and I had to even up the hair cause it was so whispy, uneven and thin at the ends, so it’s even shorter now 😡 My natural hair is 12 inches long, and the “18 inch” bundle came down to below my collar bone, only a few inches past my natural hair. I also had to thin out my real hair in order to blend it with these thin ass halo extensions these crappy bundles made. I’m only 5’2” for reference. Oh, and they shed like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: GMV

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious when purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Boxing nice, hair is pretty after initial unboxing, bundles are a little thin, FOUL & I mean FOUL smell even after washing, it will be gone for a little while after washing then come right back. Washed before install & smell came back after hair dried, washed again after install & had to take it out because of how bad the smell was. Only has hair in for 3 days before I couldn’t take the smell anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Indian Trail NC

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I want can't believe how wonderful this hair is, I've had the hair for almost 3 weeks and it seems to get better. I really didn't know what to expect making the purchase off of Amazon but I'm glad I did and am hoping all their hair is like this my favorite thing is that it dyed very easily. I've spent way more money and got crap thank you for actually selling a great product. Update : I have had this hair for 3 almost 3 months and I swear it's the best thinking about ordering a longer length and just adding to what I have. Can't believe I found this on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Delivered a day early thanks to amazon deliverers. Hair very soft. Each bundle true to length and full. Very minimal shedding like almost none. Thick wefts. No order. IS HUMAN HAIR! Curls great! Wash with cold water!!!! & let air dry for the hair to last a long time! Worth the buy if you’re on a budget! I got 10,12,14 just to try my first time but I’ll be purchasing longer lengths next time! I’m satisfied. Thank you! Also forgot to mention they sent 2 hair ties and a pair of lashes as a gift 😊 hair ties came in handy while I was straightening the hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honest review - so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like this hair. I used 2 of each of the 18 and 20 inch. I got this hair installed about 2 weeks ago. Shedding has not been bad, very little tangling and there have been some nights i went to bed with just a ponytail and without trying it up or flexirodding it. I have straighten it but it has gone back to the bodywave curl pattern. I dont use alot of product in my weave. Just heat protection and dry shampoo when i think its starting to look oily.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Elle Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice wave pattern that will wave back up after wash ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ll really give it about a 3.5-4. Nice wave pattern that will wave back up after wash and easy to manage however it’s gets slightly tangled sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great but isn't all one length.
customer_reviews.text: This hair is amazing!! My only complaint is that all the strands in the hair isn't the same length, if i order a 24 inch i expect all of the hair to one length there's a lot of short hair mixed in the bundle which makes to hair appear frizzy as you can see in the picture. If they could fix this one issue everything would be great!! This is my 3rd purchase♥️
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: This hair is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast. The hair is so soft. I like the texture a lot . The price it really low ,cheap but the quality is still great! The hair is natural color 1b but you can dye it black if you want. It’s true to length. The purchased a lace closure and three bundles size 8’,14’,16’ and a 12’ closure. I’m glad I did . I would reconsider this hair to all of my friends and family. Thanks Sayas Company!
customer_reviews.author: Lace Royalty Wig Store

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for........
customer_reviews.text: The inches are not what you order. The 10 inches was more like 8 inches. The hair was tangled and not in the best presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Closure was a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The hair was soft and had a good texture. The ends are little thin compared to the top of the bundles. The closure appeared to be of good quality it was very easy to bleach the knots. The only issue I had was after 2 weeks of my clients install the closure became tangled and lost a tremendous amount of hair. It was super thin I was able to move the part to cover but I can only image what another 2 weeks will look like. This closure will have to be replaced at week 4. If I was aware before her appointment I would have replaced it at 2weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Domob0082

customer_reviews.title: Decent hair for a good price
customer_reviews.text: So my hair came in time as expected with a pair of lashes and a head band as cute lil gifts..as for the hair i was impressed the lengths were accurate there was no odor and i didn't have to wash b4 install..my hair dresser also complimented the hair and said it was nice ..it curled well and has very little shedding...id recommed it to anyone not wanting to spend some crazy amt but still want a decent quality..ps i like really thick full hair so id say get 4 bundles but 3 did the job just gave more of a natural look...overall i like the hair! Enjoy Ladies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henrell

customer_reviews.title: Good Hair for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The hair was great. Super soft and had so much body when i had it installed. The waves were beautiful. I ordered the 10, 12, 14 inch bundles with a 10 inch closure. It looked natural and blended in well witg my natural hair. The only reason why i give it 4 stars is because the closure has several fly aways..theres alot of short pieces that stick up and there has a gew strands of reddish and brown hair. With some hair spray i was able to get the short hairs to lay down. But overall the hair is worth it and pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality hair! Gave me a rash! Bad after 1st wash!
customer_reviews.text: So it came fast! The hair was gorgeous when I received it! But after I washed it the hair gave me a rash down my neck and on the back and sides of my ears! And the hair is super tangled and sheds terribly! I would not buy this hair again.. and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: lauren lee

customer_reviews.title: Not my quality of hair!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! Alot of synthetic fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tanner

customer_reviews.title: This hair is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I made my wig June 18th and a month later with no products in my hair , this hair is still bouncy and soft ... I’m not one to take care of hair and I’ve only worn this hair at work 3 times a week in Vegas heat , few tangles here and there but that’s normal .... I FOUND MY NEW VENDOR
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This Hair is GRRRREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair was definitely better than expected. Never thought I would order hair off amazon but this was super worth it. No shedding, silky smooth. No issues. The beautician even liked the hair and stated that I wasn't the first to get a good grade of hair off amazon. Big ups to this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Search no more.
customer_reviews.text: This hair is incredible!! The packaging was so neat and organized. I've spent hundreds of dollars on hair and their packaging was horrible. Sayas Hair even gave me two unexpected gifts. Thank you! The hair is so soft! I received 10, 12, 14 inches. No tangles. No shedding so far... I will come back with a follow-up review in a week. Thank you Sayas Hair. I will be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Klee Sisters

customer_reviews.title: Thin and ratty
customer_reviews.text: The hair was extremely thin. I didn’t expect it to be all that. And I do know that typically the longer the hair the thinner the ends but this hair was not good at all. If it’s for a quick weekend style go for it. But if you expect it to last longer than two weeks and still look DECENT don’t waste your moolah.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great hair, but tangles/sheds really bad. Synthetic fibers.
customer_reviews.text: Great hair that is thick and installs beautifully. It has synthetic fibers in it and tangles up pretty bad after a couple weeks. I’ve ordered this hair twice now. If you need a quick style that you don’t intend to keep in long, this hair is great for the money. But if you’re looking for something that will sustain past a couple weeks, this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 20, 22, 24 inch bundles with a 20 inch closure, and i made a wig. the hair is so soft and holds a curl nicely. (i mostly use flexi rods). very true to length, and i would definitely recommend. it does have a slight smell, but it went away when i used my styling products. whenever i decide to make another unit, i definitely will purchase this hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick purchase..
customer_reviews.text: The hair isn't bad but it does take a lot of maintenance. Sheds a lot, tangles in the nape and this is body wave hair. The closure wasn't too bad. It was a little thin but you can get away with it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Not true to length/thin bundles
customer_reviews.text: I waited 2 weeks before I decided to write review. First off wasn’t true to length I ordered 14,16,18 14 inch closure and the 14 in looked the same as the 18 in so disappointed. Second bundles were thin my head looks like I have 2 bundles in it not 3 and a closure. And lastly it’s shedding like crazy as week 2. It’s soft and feels good no tangles but I wanted it to be true the length and at least full. Overall not happy with the product. Update: Seller got in contact with me and made it right thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nette Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This hair is nice. This was my first time getting a weave and for the first time it’s a great buy. The closure is very dark and dense. Even after bleaching the knots you can see the netting underneath. However it curls great and holds the curl. It’s natural lookin minus the closure
customer_reviews.author: Druin

customer_reviews.title: Just as described! Maybe even better❤️
customer_reviews.text: This hair is awesome!! The bundles were full, hair had no smell, no shedding or anything. I dyed the hair with boxed hair dye (no bleach) and the hair is still just as soft and beautiful as it was before. I will certainly buy from this vendor again!!
customer_reviews.author: Heirrika

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my hair in a day like promised!! KUDOS!! For less than 200.00 this is some good hair. Because of my lengths i already knew the bundles would be thin but i still had hair left over and i have a big ass head honestly!! It sheds a little but not enough for you to be leaving a trail everywhere. All in all i would purchase again! :)
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the bundles were very full and soft. I sent them off to be colored and then had them installed. I noticed the hair was a little stiff and the curl pattern wasn’t the same BUT I don’t know if they were chemically burned by the stylist OR they just weren’t great quality to start off with. I would order again and leave the color alone.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited my hair was delivered in exactly 2 days with Prime. Very soft texture, but not pleased with the length. The body does not look like the picture at all. I love the way the package came in! In a nice gift box with eye lashes and headband included.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Marie

customer_reviews.title: Saves you time going to the beauty supply store and hair is just as nice as some of their products
customer_reviews.text: Made a really nice wig out of it. Not sure how it will look a few months from now but so far it really is holding up well. I purchased this hair a couple of months ago and it’s still holding up nicely. I might not have to go to the store anymore for hair because this is cheaper and just as nice As similar products I get at the store.
customer_reviews.author: cheana irby

customer_reviews.title: This hair is so softtttttt
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this hair installed for about two days but this hair is just beautifully soft . I order hair of amazon very often and this hair is my favorite! I did have a minor issue when I first got the hair I contacted the seller via email they asked for my phone number and kept in contact and was very pleasant during the whole process of correcting the issue . If you are having a birthday coming up or an important even this is definitely the hair for you ! I mean look at how my hair just blows in the wind and it wasn’t that windy out love love love this hair ! Clearly I’m obsessed 🤷🏾‍♀️❤️
customer_reviews.author: leiasia

customer_reviews.title: It’s not full , not thick very thin actually
customer_reviews.text: Very soft hair , but the bundles are not really full so make sure you get more bundles in other get that thick look ... other wise it was a very good hair and a little of smell as well
customer_reviews.author: Lua F

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Hair shipped and arrived the same day. Hair was really soft. I had it installed, it was fine first week. Started to shed and kinks up at the nape area. Does not hold a curl from curling iron. It's okay but wouldn't plan for to many installs.
customer_reviews.author: VONDA L. DOSS

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough for a sew-in!
customer_reviews.text: Hair is soft and pretty, however it has a horrible odor. Will try to get smell out via washing and conditioning the hair prior to installing . Initially bought for wig making...
customer_reviews.author: Zenya Christa

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Money!!
customer_reviews.text: The worse hair I have ever purchased. Granted the hair is really soft, but the bundles are very thin. The length is not correct and worst of all, does not hold a curl at all. Not even 5 minutes after the hair dresser finished there was not one curl left. I even rodded the hair one night with tiny rod and it had very tight curls when I took them out, but an hour later- not one curl left. The hair just lays flat. No waves at all. Please don’t waste your money because I sure did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Hair is good but length is way shorter than it says if you buy and want length buy longer way longer you can do a cheap wig or a nice sew in but hair is good for price
customer_reviews.author: Lovey

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! No shedding, no tangling! I could not be more pleased. I did a full sew-in with no leave out. I purchased my closure separately but the hair was easy to match with the closure hair. My install only required 2 of the 3 included bundles and I think it is still very full and bouncy. My hair is natural, so this hair gave me an opportunity to take a break from my beloved curls and change up my look without damaging my hair. This is a very nice quality of hair that I highly recommend. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Carter #1

customer_reviews.title: Got my money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: Good hair it does shed some but this is my second time installing the hair it’s good hair for the price I also dyed it I think it looks much better jet black
customer_reviews.author: Tasha woolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering bundles online and naturally I was nervous. These bundles exceeded my expectations. They were soft, easy to install, no shedding and lasted far longer than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: 5116JJD

customer_reviews.title: Great hair! Buy buy buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had this hair installed for 10 weeks and when I say it did not shed a hair for at least 2 weeks! And after that it would shed maybe 5 hairs at every wash, and only when you washed it, and that was it! This is the best hair for the money you can buy, definitely worth it. Holds a curl well, maintains bounce and shine, true to length, no smell. The hair is definitely reusable I just couldn't because I damaged the wefts so much trying to take it out lol.
customer_reviews.author: JBK

customer_reviews.title: Bad hair. Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is not great hair, people please save your money. The hair is low quality and doesn't have good stitching on the track. It is very uneven throughout the track and the hair has lots of split ends.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyiana Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Really nice company
customer_reviews.text: The hair was soft, but I did not receive the right lengths the 20” was shorter than the 18”. It’s like I received two 16” and an 18”. Update: The company reached out to me and Chris got all my information and sent over the 20” bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Quita

customer_reviews.title: This hair is nice.
customer_reviews.text: This hair is nice. I installed it as a quick weave and cut it into a short bomb. I kept it om for a month and it stayed soft the whole time. I could have kept it in longer. I would have rated ut 5 stars but, i felt like the bundle were a little thin and when I washed it, it did not wave up like it's orignal state. I would, however, purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair, 1st time buying hair like this, light shedding, which is way better than my 40$ hair I be buying lolbvs havent straighten it yet, because a lil wrap lotion, wrap it, tie down an it came out good like that💯
customer_reviews.author: Jakeia Holman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a bit thin
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft. Beautiful hair. I gave four stars because it is pretty thin on the track. You’ll have to double up if you want a fuller look. But I made it work with the style that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Was not the quality I expected
customer_reviews.text: The pack lacked fullness. I usually buy from a local store but they were closed for a while, so I ordered here. The product is nice but it did not last half as long as any other products I have used in the past. I appreciate the fast service. I like a very full look and I am use to full tracks. I think for me it didn't work because it is not what I am use to.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering from this company and I’m in love with my hair!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovemzstar

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I read the reviews thinking the hair was okay but its not smh it came with thin ends that were also DRY. The hair has been in my head for less than a week and its a matted mess its coming out asap a waste of money truly dont buy this hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Hair was pretty, weft was nice and thick but tje hair itself was very thin on the ends. Something told me to go longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Although the shipping was delayed 2 days, this hair quality is amazing!! The hair is very silky & soft & never tangles. The closure has some fly always but nothing a wax stick can’t fix. The 28 inch bundle was thin at the ends as expected.I paid $200 for 4 bundles.(22,24,26,28) & a 22 inch closure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shed too much
customer_reviews.text: This hair shed too much and I didn't really like the hair at all,but it do take dye well
customer_reviews.author: Aquarius Val

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap human hair
customer_reviews.text: This is some good human hair for a reasonable price. It sheds a little but I will definitely recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: Hair is OK
customer_reviews.text: Hair was soft and no smell upon arrival. Lasted 1 1⁄2 months after install. The hair didnt keep the wave pattern like I hoped it would and it shed a little more than I preferred. I'd probably buy again for a quick style but nothing long term. Definitely not reusable, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: HEAT means STINK
customer_reviews.text: Overall I loved the hair! Great quality, texture was great and awesome wave pattern. I was able to bleach the hair w/o a problem the only thing is once wet the wave pattern is gone. Shedding was to a minimum. The only thing I’ll say I did not like about the hair was once I added heat it STANK VERY BAD and the smell never went away! Will I order again? No, but it’s great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service was excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered the hair. She likes it!! What I liked, was the fact that the wrong hair was delivered, and amazon "sayas", didn't waste anytime reordering the right hair, and shipping it out to us within two days. We will order again soon!!
customer_reviews.author: denise napoleon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I know you get what you pay for, but I do not think this was worth the money at all. Number one, the hair I ordered was not true to length at all. Number 2, there were all kinds of twigs and crap sewn into the weft of the hair... How do twigs get into the hair? Number three when I took it out the bundle, it was all tangled, thin and frizzy. This is absolutely horrible hair.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Perez

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The bundles came in a nicely packed box, neatly wrapped with hair ties and lashes as a thank you. The hair had no smell, so far I have washed and conditioned the hair with hardly any shedding, also the wefts are nice and thick,
customer_reviews.author: james glenn

customer_reviews.title: Just save your $
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair because they said it was 100% human hair and it definitely isn’t. It’s a blend with fake hair so save your money luvs they got me for my money don’t let them get you for yours too. This hair is freaking horrible I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Joy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Hair/Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS HAIR! It had threads sticking out of it in red, orange and pink. There were clumps of lint in the hair and the hair is of poor quality. There are several strands of hair comes out when you comb it or run your fingers through it. This hair was a complete rip off. The body wave lasted all of a couple hours. This hair is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Lovely curls.
customer_reviews.text: I love the curls on this hair. It’s very soft and bouncy. The only issue is that it had some odour which I was able to take care of though by washing with a mild shampoo. The unit is full and the wefts are double. It also came with a beautiful pink head band and eyelashes as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: chuks elochukwu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This hair was priced well and I love it. No smell and minimal care needed. I installed it. Washed it multiple times, have always came back to life. I flat ironed, rolled , blow dried this hair and the results were great. The hair is full. Can't say enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Very soft! Little to no shedding!
customer_reviews.text: They hair is amazingly soft and very light weight. Only complaint that I have is the the ends are a little thin so you have to use a lot to make the ends look full. Little to no shedding, beautiful in the sunlight, a lot of brown highlights which I loved.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Bleaching this hair
customer_reviews.text: I asked the hair store girl about bleaching this hair n she said after I bleach it let it soak n hair condition a quality one made for perms n bleaching.... she said it will bring back the quality of the hair n leave it soft but after I rinse the condition out let the hair air dry n I did n the hair was soft n pretty n ready to use but when u rinse use cold water
customer_reviews.author: korie aire

customer_reviews.title: Not the right inches
customer_reviews.text: Only reason am giving low score this hair seem to be 8in each for the 10 and 12 in as for the 14 I didn't even bother to che I it and am not happy as for the quality that seem to be good but I wish I had gotten what I paid for sadly am gonna have to return it which I didn't want to because I wanted to get my hair done for work
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY THIS HAIR!!! GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so at first I was skeptical about ordering this hair, but when I tell you THIS HAIR IS BOMB AF IM NOT LYING!!! GRADE AAA QUALITY very soft doesn’t shed great wefts you get your monies worth the list goes on and on
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: The hair is beautiful, soft, shiny, and honestly honestly amazing! It is Thick/full bundles. Minimum shedding, they were amazing and honestly so nice!! All in all, still be ordering from them again. Great hair, great customer service, just overall great! Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just received my hair today. yes it is very soft the ends are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair
customer_reviews.text: This hair was very soft, no smell, little shedding. I did a quick weave short style with this hair.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the hair its soft and full, true to length. It was worth the money and I would recommended this product. I will be ordering for this company again.
customer_reviews.author: C Forney

customer_reviews.title: 100%human
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first..the reviews were up and down..but this hair is the truth! 100%human hair..very soft to touch..it had maybe one or two red/grayish strands in one bundle but i cut them out..no biggy. Overall very beautiful for the price..i bought 10/12/14/16/18/20" cant wait to install!
customer_reviews.author: Asia*

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SHORT TERM HAIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice hair for short term use(this was great for me because I don’t like to keep hair in for long periods). Soft silky and shiny. Great for the price. I’ve had this hair in for over a month now. Holds a curl well, but is now starting to get a little stiff. Little to no shedding
customer_reviews.author: Poria W.

customer_reviews.title: I reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but so far looks like it will be good product.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hair feb25 and I recieved it Feb26. Delivery was super fast which is a big plus for me. I havent installed this hair yet but i am impressed with the soft texture of each bundle. The lengths are true and it doesnt have any nasty scent which I was really worried about. I'm actually excited to install soon. For the price I say its definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Petergay aurelis

customer_reviews.title: HEY IT IS WHAT IT IS
customer_reviews.text: Hey you get what you pay for. I have no complaints about this hair. I had it in from Feb 13 till March 4. Better than some of the most of the expensive hair i purchased.
customer_reviews.author: BACONGIRL

customer_reviews.title: So sad.. Bday ruined!!!
customer_reviews.text: The hair looks lovely.. But upon installing the hair.. It is shedding. ... Tangling in thr back... Cannot be real human hair!!. Co washed and air dried and it almost looks like doll baby hair. So sad!!Im not sure if this is 10A hair because this hair has ALOT of strange red strands of hair all through it
customer_reviews.author: Spurgina Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: I love this soft hair
customer_reviews.text: This is really good hair it came a day early and I couldn't be more happier I will be buying this again I haven't put heat to it yet but I will update when I do I curl is still there and it dont shead alot just minor but that's all hair so my 4 star is very deserving I only had it in for some days so i will update on a later note for a weeks time
customer_reviews.author: Shatia Day

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair! I made a wig, I received, so many compliments :) Niccce bundles, hair didn't stink or shed. Very soft! I razor cut it and also, made bangs. I don't have a pic with the bangs!
customer_reviews.author: Mystique
